title: Newcastle United 1-2 Barcelona: Champions League – live
summary: Newcastle dominated the first half but failed to score, leading to their downfall. Marcus Rashford's impressive brace secured a win for Barcelona. The match highlighted Newcastle's inability to convert opportunities into goals.

title: Australia news live: ‘I can’t promise cheaper energy,’ says Bowen; rescuers search bush for crashed plane pilot
summary: The climate minister stated that the government is attempting to balance emissions with pricing strategies. In a separate incident, a light aircraft has gone missing near Batemans Bay. Search efforts are likely underway to locate the aircraft and its occupants.

title: Manchester City 2-0 Napoli: Champions League – as it happened
summary: Napoli's captain received a red card just 20 minutes into the match, leaving the team at a disadvantage. Manchester City then focused on exploiting this opportunity. Ultimately, they succeeded in breaking down Napoli's defense to secure a victory.

title: Jimmy Kimmel suspension: Trump suggests networks who cover him ‘negatively’ could lose licenses – live
summary: During a flight on Air Force One, the US President claimed that 97% of media networks are "against" him, but provided no evidence to support this assertion. In response, Senate Majority Leader Chuck Schumer accused the President of attempting to "snuff out free speech." This exchange highlights ongoing tensions between the administration and the media.

title: Doku decorates Manchester City’s win over Napoli after De Bruyne return ends early
summary: Manchester City defeated Napoli 2-0 with second-half goals from Erling Haaland and Jérémy Doku. Kevin De Bruyne made a brief return to his former club during the match. City's victory highlights their strong performance in the competition.
